name: tailwindcss
description: Tailwindcss module for Proxmox Auto Installer

scripts.dev: concurrently -n TAILWIND,PYTHON,RELOAD -c yellow,blue,green "npx tailwindcss -i ./styles/app.css -o ../static/css/tailwind.css --watch" "nodemon --watch ../../back_end --ext py --exec \"python ../../back_end/server.py dev\"" "nodemon --watch ../../front_end/**/* --ext js,html,css --exec \"curl -k -s -X POST https://10.0.4.2:33008/trigger-reload\""

author: Anthony Tropeano
